attributes.name: Nping Process Activity v100.0.2
attributes.description: Nping ran on a Linux host. Nping is part of the Nmap tool suite and has the ability to construct raw packets for a wide variety of security testing applications, including denial of service testing.
author: Elastic
false_positives: Some normal use of this command may originate from security engineers and network or server administrators, but this is usually not routine or unannounced. Use of `Nping` by non-engineers or ordinary users is uncommon.
attributes.query: event.category:process and event.type:(start or process_started) and process.name:nping
